G

GameEnvironment - Class in main
The GameEnvironment class stores all game variables that made sense to be static, such as the user's team and inventory.
GameEnvironment() - Constructor for class main.GameEnvironment
 
GameManager - Class in main
The GameManager class allows for easy control of the GUI
i.e The launching and closing of various screens
GameManager() - Constructor for class main.GameManager
 
gameSuccess - Static variable in class main.GameEnvironment
Represents if the Player/User successfully completed the game
generateAthlete(int) - Static method in class main.Athlete
Generates a new Athlete object with randomized properties based on the given quality
generateAthletes(int, int) - Static method in class main.Athlete
Calls generateAthlete to make an ArrayList of random athletes
generateItem() - Static method in class main.Item
Generates a new Item object with randomized properties
generateItems(int) - Static method in class main.Item
Calls generateItem to make an ArrayList of random items
generateTeam(int) - Static method in class main.Team
Randomly generates a team with a given level of strength (quality)
get(int) - Method in class main.Team
Replicates the ArrayList.get method, allows for more concise code
getAvgStat() - Method in class main.Athlete
Gets the average of the athlete's stats
getBestAthlete() - Method in class main.Team
Finds the best athlete in the team based on average stat total

Returns the current items available for purchase from the marketplace
